Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits robots and uncrewed aircraft equipped or mounted with weapons
Summary: Prohibits the manufacture, modification, sale, transfer, equipping, use, or operation of a robotic device or an uncrewed aircraft equipped or mounted with a weapon within the state.
LawCode: Add ยง396-eeee, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting robots and uncrewed aircraft equipped or mounted with weapons
